roleset.name: bring together, solidfy (physically or metaphorically)
roleset.note: CRYSTALLIZE-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick. Member of VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from crystallize.01-v)

example.name: crystallize
example.text: Since [the company] has [*]-9 got to crystallize the inverstors ' and staff 's talents and energies, its vision for the future has * to be attainable.
example.arg: the investors ' and staff 's talents and energies.

example.name: with source
example.text: In September of last year two ideas for programs crystallized out of the journalistic blood of her heart.
example.arg: out of the journalistic blood of her heart.
